name: Crayon Shin-chan - Arashi wo Yobu Kasukabe Eiga Stars! [3DS]
description:
Crayon Shin-chan: Arashi o Yobu Kasukabe Eiga Stars! is an action game developed by Inti. It came out on 16-04-2004. Bandai Namco Entertainment published the game.
Crayon Shin-chan: Arashi o Yobu Kasukabe Eiga Stars! is available on Nintendo DS and Nintendo 3DS.
